upgradeToOwner(address,address,bytes32,u.details: use to temporarily upgrade read or write access of an address to owner access

params._delegate: Ethereum address whos permission is to be temporarily upgarded
params._fromTime: Time from which the delegate has upgraded write access
params._toTime: Time till which the delegate has upgraded write access
